name: T - Emma Fernando
_source: speak;Fernando; Oh, you're one of those recruits Nina convinced to join us, right?{w} I'm glad to have you in our ranks.{w} Power in numbers and all.
speak;Emma; Wh- Hold on, I'm not a recruit for anyone.{w} I've got a bone to pick with you!
speak;Fernando; Funny, because I don't think I've seen your face before.
speak;Emma; You're not getting away from me!{w} Some moons ago, you ran into me in the middle of the night,{w} before leaving without any explanation.
speak;Emma; Don't play dumb with me!{w} I want an apology.
speak;Fernando; I think you've mistaken me for another.{w} Personally, I'm going back to the battle at hand.
speak;Emma; We're not done with this talk yet!
speak;Fernando; Actually, I do believe we are.
